label: ProductionWasteMaterial
comment: Any materials unused and rejected as unwanted during a production process.

datatypeProperties.comment: A code specifying a type of MDH health indication.

objectProperties.comment: A collection of data for a piece of written, printed or electronic matter that provides information or evidence about the product.
A production waste recovery disposal process applicable to this production waste material.
A prominent attribute or aspect of an object, such as recyclability of a product, which can meet customer needs without compromising the ability of future generations to meet their own needs.
A production waste material component included in this production waste material.

referencedBy.comment: Any materials unused and rejected as unwanted during a production process.
